definition: to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
variant of 彌漫|弥漫[mi2 man4]

sentences.english: Antibiotic therapy for diffuse cellulitis should be aggressive .
sentences.chinese: 弥漫性蜂窝织炎的抗菌素治疗应是强有力的。

sentences.english: The room reeked of cheap perfume.
sentences.chinese: 房间里弥漫着劣质香水的呛鼻气味。

sentences.english: Anticoagulants are effective in selected cases of disseminated intravascular coagulation.
sentences.chinese: 抗凝剂对于某些弥漫性血管内凝血的病例还是有效的。

sentences.english: The atmosphere will be filled with light music that would only serve as background as people converse with each other.
sentences.chinese: 人们彼此交谈时，周围弥漫着作为背景的轻音乐。

sentences.english: The prognosis of diffuse cerebral laceration and diffuse axonal injury was worse.
sentences.chinese: 弥漫性脑挫裂伤或弥漫性轴索损伤预后较差。

sentences.english: The prognosis of diffuse cerebral laceration and diffuse axonal injury was worse.
sentences.chinese: 弥漫性脑挫裂伤或弥漫性轴索损伤预后较差。

sentences.english: She fills my heart with very special things.
sentences.chinese: 她以特殊的芬芳弥漫了我的心间。

sentences.english: Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) is a highly heterogeneous disease.
sentences.chinese: 弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤是一种高度异质性疾病。

sentences.english: At early times, all matter took the form of a hot and all-pervading gas.
sentences.chinese: 在早期，一切物质都处于炽热且弥漫八方的气体状态。

sentences.english: Emission nebula Sharpless 249 fills the field at the upper left.
sentences.chinese: 发射星云沙普利斯249弥漫在图像的左上部。

sentences.english: There were groans all around the room.
sentences.chinese: 房间里弥漫着此起彼伏的叹息声。

sentences.english: Thoracoscopy revealed multiple diffuse lung cysts.
sentences.chinese: 胸腔镜下看见弥漫性多发肺囊泡。

sentences.english: He hates the smokiness of pubs and bars.
sentences.chinese: 他讨厌酒馆和酒吧里弥漫的烟雾。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the X-ray diagnosis of diffuse pulmonary disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肺弥漫性疾病的X线诊断。

sentences.english: Heater breeze, the sun, the air thick with incense of glutinous rice.
sentences.chinese: 暖风习习，艳阳高照，空气中弥漫着浓浓的糯米香。

sentences.english: Do you smell jasmine in the air?
sentences.chinese: 你闻到空中弥漫的茉莉花香了吗？

definition: to dissipate everywhere (of light, sound, gas etc)
to drift/to wave/to float on the waves/to flutter in the wind
(of a vapor etc) to rise/to hang in the air
(of a perfume or a foul odor) permeating the whole place/(of grease etc) dripping everywhere/flowing all over the place
lit. sth hits one in the face/directly in one's face/sth assaults the senses/blatant (advertising)/eye-catching/(a smell) assaults the nostrils
